body: May I ask, what's the Korean Name for this?  I've tried to type the artist name however it just shows it with the old series "Bittersweet" but with nothing new.  This is clearly that artist work, and if anyone knows the real Korean name for this series would it be possible if they commented on here.  Thanks!

My only problem with this kind of works is that most of them feel unsatisfying because they go around and around and around simple problems. Here at least you get a pretty hot scene. I don't know how the story goes but at least it left a damn good scene.
Really nice art, shame it's a manhwa and someone is going to get cucked sooner or later
anyone know the alternative name of this manhwa?

⬇️hmmm, it is Korean Suspense comic…
A hot lady with no memory…  a man claims to be her husband… let the secretary monitor her and supervise her to take unknown pills every day.
Cover is hot but I bet this is  a chinese clasical melodrama
